question: What is the next number in the sequence: 2, 5, 10, 17, ___?
If a train travels 60 miles per hour, how long will it take to travel 120 miles?
A box contains 6 red balls, 5 blue balls, and 4 green balls. What is the probability of picking a red ball?
If the sum of three consecutive integers is 57, what is the middle integer?
A car travels 120 kilometers in 2 hours. What is its average speed?
If a shopkeeper sells an article for $80 and gains 20%, what is the cost price?
What is the area of a rectangle with a length of 8 cm and a width of 6 cm?
What is the sum of the angles in a triangle?
If 4x = 32, what is the value of x?
What is the perimeter of a square with a side length of 5 cm?
A sum of money doubles in 10 years. What will be the compound interest for 20 years?
If a person invests $1000 at 5% annual interest, how much interest will they earn in 2 years?
If a number is divisible by 3 and 4, what is the smallest possible number it could be divisible by?
What is the median of the following set of numbers: 3, 5, 8, 12, 15?
What is the value of 8 raised to the power of 3?
A man can row 5 km/h in still water. If the current flows at 1 km/h, what is his effective speed downstream?
What is the volume of a cube with a side length of 4 cm?
A coin is tossed 3 times. What is the probability of getting exactly two heads?
If a sum of money grows to 4 times its value in 2 years, what will be its value in 5 years at the same rate?
How many sides does a dodecagon have?
What is the mode of the following data set: 1, 3, 3, 5, 7, 8?
What is the area of a circle with a radius of 7 cm? (Use π = 22/7)
What is the value of x in the equation 3x + 4 = 19?
If 15% of a number is 30, what is the number?
The ratio of the ages of two brothers is 4:5. If the older brother is 25 years old, how old is the younger brother?
If a person walks 5 km in 1 hour, how long will it take him to walk 45 km?
What is the value of 2⁴?
If the cost price of 15 items is equal to the selling price of 12 items, what is the percentage profit?
If the perimeter of a rectangle is 30 meters and its length is 8 meters, what is the width?
A sum of money triples in 5 years. What is the annual compound interest rate?
What is the average of the first 10 prime numbers?
What is the least common multiple of 12 and 15?
What is the value of 12 × 12 + 15 × 15?
What is the distance traveled by a car moving at a speed of 60 km/h for 3 hours?
If a triangle has sides of lengths 3 cm, 4 cm, and 5 cm, what type of triangle is it?
What is the value of sin(90°)?
If a car travels 240 km in 3 hours, what is its average speed?
What is the sum of the first 10 natural numbers?
If a rectangle has a length of 10 cm and a width of 5 cm, what is its area?
What is the value of 5! (5 factorial)?
If a person can complete a task in 10 hours, how long will it take 5 people to complete the same task?
What is the probability of rolling a sum of 7 with two dice?
If a triangle has angles of 60°, 70°, and x°, what is the value of x?
What is the value of log(100) to the base 10?
If a person invests $2000 at an interest rate of 5% per annum, how much interest will they earn in 3 years?
What is the area of a triangle with a base of 10 cm and a height of 5 cm?
If a car travels 150 km in 2 hours, what is its average speed?
What is the value of (3 + 5) × (2 - 1)?
If a person can read 30 pages in an hour, how many pages can they read in 4 hours?
What is the value of x in the equation 2x + 3 = 11?
If a sum of money is divided among 3 people in the ratio 2:3:5, what fraction of the total amount does the first person receive?
What is the value of 7 × (8 + 2) - 5?
If a person can complete a task in 12 hours, how long will it take 4 people to complete the same task?
What is the value of sin(30°)?
If a car travels at a speed of 80 km/h for 2.5 hours, how far does it travel?
What is the value of 3² + 4²?
If a person can run 10 km in 1 hour, how long will it take to run 50 km?
What is the area of a circle with a radius of 3 cm? (Use π = 3.14)
If a sum of money is divided among 4 people in the ratio 1:2:3:4, what fraction of the total amount does the third person receive?
What is the value of (5 + 3) × (2 - 1)?
If a person can read 60 pages in an hour, how many pages can they read in 3 hours?
What is the value of x in the equation 3x - 5 = 16?
If a sum of money is divided among 5 people in the ratio 1:2:3:4:5, what fraction of the total amount does the fourth person receive?
What is the value of 9 × (6 + 4) - 5?
